answers.answer: I'm a ftm and u crave sweets all day, I just try to buy stuff that tricks mii baby meaning it's sweet & healthy. ... I cheat sometimes but try not to eat a lot u dnt want diabetes

question: The only thing i crave is candy or anything sweet i don't want to eat to much candy while I'm pregnant, is this a problem or did anybody else crave nothing but candy and ended up perfectly fine.
title: too much sugar!!??
